Richard Dawkins Talk.title: Richard Dawkins Talk
Richard Dawkins Talk.desc: Richard Dawkins is going to give an exciting talk at the Dorothy-Hodkins lecture hall bout evolution.

The Weight of Things.title: The Weight of Things
The Weight of Things.desc: Keele are hosting local artist David Bethell's latest sculpture, called The Weight of Things, to inspire staff and students during the winter months.

Keele Music Forum.title: Keele Music Forum
Keele Music Forum.desc: A new methodology for studying sample-based music

Settling.title: Settling
Settling.desc: Settling explores the different stories of people who have moved to stoke-on-Trent from around the world.
